I had this error, I unplugged my router and turned my Xbox off from the wall. Waited for a few and turned the Xbox back on. When it was on I deleted hw 2 from my games and redownloaded it. Then I had to update and it worked, hope you get something sorted, as my fix may not help you!

Lived in York during my time at university. Trying to find something in the city walls is possible but it will also reflect in the price. Look at the areas outside of the walls, Acomb, Heworth, Clifton etc. All these areas have links to bus routes that can get you into town.
York is a very bicycle friendly town so I suggest looking into getting a bike, very useful!
